properties.entry: SELECT E.EMP_ID, E.EMP_NAME, J.JOB_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN JOB J ON E.JOB_CODE = J.JOB_CODE WHERE E.EMP_NAME LIKE CONCAT(?,'%')
SELECT EMP_ID,EMP_NAME,PHONE,SALARY FROM EMPLOYEE ORDER BY SALARY DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT EMP_ID,EMP_NAME,PHONE,SALARY FROM EMPLOYEE ORDER BY SALARY DESC LIMIT 4
SELECT EMP_ID,EMP_NAME,PHONE,SALARY FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE SALARY = (SELECT MAX(SALARY) FROM EMPLOYEE)
SELECT A.EMP_ID,A.EMP_NAME,A.PHONE,B.JOB_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE A JOIN JOB B ON A.JOB_CODE = B.JOB_CODE WHERE EMP_NAME = '선동일'
